Package parkeersimulator.model.car

Class Car

  • java.lang.Object
    • parkeersimulator.framework.Model
      • parkeersimulator.model.car.Car
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AdHocCar, ParkingPassCar, ParkingPassSpot, ReservedSpot
    public abstract class Car
extends Model
    This class represents a car with no entry type, Has the properties location and payment process of the customer.
    Version:
    27.01.2019.
